text: [Music]
give me shockwaves
[Music]
today i'm pleased to welcome jim penman
ceo of gyms which is the largest
services franchise in the southern
hemisphere do you welcome to aws
business builders what has inspired you
to to start the gyms franchise tell us
about your founder story
well um desperation and the need to eat
was
i did a phd in history and ended up in
1982 basically flat broke deeply in debt
and with no possible job in sight so i
just turned my part-time lawn mowing
business which i did as a student into a
full-time business and i franchised
seven years later wow and you started
with gardening but it's far more than
that now because you've built an amazing
business a 500 million dollar business
what were the i guess the core drivers
for the success of that business started
off i i always had a passion for service
i basically had this aim i was going to
make my franchisees into
really really really raving fans that
was the idea that was the concept behind
it when somebody asked me at the
beginning they said how many franchises
do you think you might have one day if
it works out maybe one day we'll have a
hundred we're currently at four thousand
six hundred and something and counting
and still growing i love that again as
an example about customer obsession this
is very much about what we try to do at
aws is to help our customers understand
their customers so i'm very interested
to hear what role has technology played
in delivering a better customer
experience one of the most crucial
things is when you call a client back if
a client calls in a job how quickly do
you call them back well we have a system
with developing systems where it
actually lets us know if we haven't done
the right thing we haven't followed up
so it reminds people
so what we can help people to do is to
understand what their levels of service
is and automate that response one of the
things we're developing is an app for
customers so that a customer can go into
the app and they can work out all kinds
of things when's their next lawn mowing
service due when's their dog due to be
done when's he coming how's he booked up
for the day and then they can also just
press a single button and say okay i've
got my lawns my no dog washed and i want
my cleaning done bang and suddenly a
message goes out and five minutes later
hopefully franchisee brings up and says
how can i help you so there's a more
than 99 reduction in complaints
in the last 30 years all driven by
technology what we know for sure from
our customers is that costs is a real
imperative for them as they're managing
for the future tell us how technology
has changed your costs environment
you've got to have a system which is
scalable and that wasn't so in the old
days when you used to just have your own
server sitting in an extra room
and then you have a problem because
because then you need to grow beyond
that you need another server and then
you have excess capacity you don't have
enough capacity and so forth so it was
very obvious for us to go to
the cloud our finance department for
example we've actually got a program
over the next 12 months to automate so
many of the simple processes in that we
can actually keep on growing the
business without growing the staff
members
innovation agility scalability cost
reduction these are all the things that
we are hearing about from business that
technology is really adding value around
so what's next for jim's group and how
can aws help you get there we love aws
because one of the reasons we went with
you guys is because it's scalable we're
actually growing very very fast and we
have a lot of ambitions to go beyond
gyms to other independent contractors
elsewhere in the world so global
expansion it's not just going to be an
australian iconic brand it's going to be
a worldwide iconic brand so thank you so
much jim for sharing your insights about
technology
and a very big thank you to everyone out
there for joining us on business
builders today
[Music]
